com.engine.input

Class MouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • com.engine.input.MouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MouseHandler
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

    MouseHandler

    MouseHandler is used to detect mouse clicks and mouse movement.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<GuiComponent> guiComponents

      LEFT_MOUSE: The left mouse button.
      static int MIDDLE_MOUSE
      MIDDLE_MOUSE: The middle mouse button.
      static int RIGHT_MOUSE
      RIGHT_MOUSE: The right mouse button.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Called whenever a mouse button is clicked.
      void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Called when the mouse is clicked and dragged.

      Called whenever the mouse moves.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Called whenever a mouse button is clicked. Each Tile, CoreObject, and GuiComponent is checked to see if it was clicked.
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseClicked in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        Parameters:
        e -

      • mouseMoved

        public void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Called whenever the mouse moves. Only GuiComponents are checked to see the mouse moved over it.
        Specified by:
        mouseMoved in interface java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
        Overrides:
        mouseMoved in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        Parameters:
        e -

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Called when a mouse button is released. When a mouse button is released, it is considered to not be dragging anymore.
        Specified by:
        mouseReleased in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
        Overrides:
        mouseReleased in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        Parameters:
        e -

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Called when the mouse is clicked and dragged. Each Tile, CoreObject, and GuiComponent is checked to see the mouse moved over it while being click-dragged.
        Specified by:
        mouseDragged in interface java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
        Overrides:
        mouseDragged in class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
        Parameters:
        e -
